document.heading: Medical Insurance Empowerment Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-369, the “Medical Insurance Empowerment Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-934 which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Approved without signature of the Mayor on January 23, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-704 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-369 became effective on March 25,
